verses.verse: Of the blue,<WH8504> purple,<WH713> and scarlet,<WH8144> they made<WH6213> finely worked<WH8278> garments,<WH899> for ministering<WH8334> in the holy<WH6944> place,<WH6213> and made the holy<WH6944> garments<WH899> for Aaron;<WH175> as Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
He made<WH6213> the ephod<WH646> of gold,<WH2091> blue,<WH8504> purple,<WH713> scarlet,<WH8438> and fine twined<WH7806> linen.<WH8336>

They beat<WH7554> the gold<WH2091> into<WH854> thin plates,<WH6341> and cut<WH7112> it into wires,<WH6616> to work<WH6213> it in the blue,<WH8504> in the purple,<WH713> in the scarlet,<WH8144> and in the fine linen,<WH8336> the work<WH4639> of the skillful workman.<WH2803>
They made<WH6213> shoulder<WH3802> straps for it,<WH2266> joined together. At the two<WH8147> ends<WH7098> it was joined together.<WH2266>

The skillfully woven band<WH2805> that was on it,<WH642> with which to fasten it on,<WH4639> was of the same piece, like its work; of gold,<WH2091> of blue,<WH8504> purple,<WH713> scarlet,<WH8144> and fine twined<WH7806> linen;<WH8336> as Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>

They worked<WH6213> the onyx<WH7718> stones,<WH68> enclosed<WH4142> in settings<WH4865> of gold,<WH2091> engraved<WH6605> with the engravings<WH6605> of a signet,<WH2368> according to the names<WH8034> of the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

He put<WH7760> them on the shoulder<WH3802> straps of the ephod,<WH646> to be stones<WH68> of memorial<WH2146> for the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> as Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>

He made<WH6213> the breastplate,<WH2833> the work<WH4639> of a skillful<WH2803> workman,<WH4639> like the work of the ephod;<WH646> of gold,<WH2091> of blue,<WH8504> purple,<WH713> scarlet,<WH8144> and fine twined<WH7806> linen.<WH8336>
It was square.<WH7251> They made<WH6213> the breastplate<WH2833> double.<WH3717> Its length<WH753> was a span,<WH2239> and its breadth<WH7341> a span,<WH2239> being double.<WH3717>
They set<WH4390> in it four<WH702> rows<WH2905> of stones.<WH68> A row<WH2905> of ruby,<WH124> topaz,<WH6357> and beryl<WH1304> was the first<WH259> row;<WH2905>
and the second<WH8145> row,<WH2905> a turquoise,<WH3095> a sapphire,<WH5601> and an emerald;<WH5306>
and the third<WH7992> row,<WH2905> a jacinth,<WH3958> an agate,<WH7618> and an amethyst;<WH306>
and the fourth<WH7243> row,<WH2905> a chrysolite,<WH8658> an onyx,<WH7718> and a jasper.<WH3471> They were enclosed<WH4142> in<WH4865> gold<WH2091> settings.<WH4865>

The stones<WH68> were according to the names<WH8034> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> twelve,<WH8147> according to their names;<WH8034> like the engravings<WH6603> of a signet,<WH2368> everyone<WH376> according to his name,<WH8034> for the twelve<WH8147> tribes.<WH7626>
They made<WH6213> on the breastplate<WH2833> chains<WH8333> like cords,<WH1383> of braided<WH5688> work<WH4639> of pure<WH2889> gold.<WH2091>

They made<WH6213> two<WH8147> settings<WH4865> of gold,<WH2091> and two<WH8147> gold<WH2091> rings,<WH2885> and put<WH5414> the two<WH8147> rings<WH2885> on the two<WH8147> ends<WH7098> of the breastplate.<WH2833>
They put<WH5414> the two<WH8147> braided chains<WH5688> of gold<WH2091> in the two<WH8147> rings<WH2885> at the ends<WH7098> of the breastplate.<WH2833>

The other two<WH8147> ends<WH7098> of the two<WH8147> braided<WH5688> chains<WH5688> they put<WH5414> on the two<WH8147> settings,<WH4865> and put<WH5414> them on the shoulder<WH3802> straps of the ephod,<WH646> in its<WH4136> front.<WH6440>

They made<WH6213> two<WH8147> rings<WH2885> of gold,<WH2091> and put<WH7760> them on the two<WH8147> ends<WH7098> of the breastplate,<WH2833> on its edge,<WH8193> which was toward the side<WH5676> of the ephod<WH646> inward.<WH1004>

They made<WH6213> two<WH8147> rings<WH2885> of gold,<WH2091> and put<WH5414> them on the two<WH8147> shoulder<WH3802> straps of the ephod<WH646> underneath,<WH4295> in<WH4136> its front,<WH6440> close<WH5980> by its coupling,<WH4225> above<WH4605> the skillfully woven band<WH2805> of the ephod.<WH646>

They bound<WH7405> the breastplate<WH2833> by its rings<WH2885> to the rings<WH2885> of the ephod<WH646> with a lace<WH6616> of blue,<WH8504> that it might be on the skillfully woven band<WH2805> of the ephod,<WH646> and that the breastplate<WH2833> might not come loose<WH2118> from the ephod,<WH646> as Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
He made<WH6213> the robe<WH4598> of the ephod<WH646> of woven<WH707> work,<WH4639> all<WH3632> of blue.<WH8504>

The opening<WH6310> of the robe<WH4598> in its midst<WH8432> was like the opening<WH6310> of a coat<WH8473> of mail,<WH8193> with a binding around<WH5439> its opening,<WH6310> that it should not be torn.<WH7167>
They made<WH6213> on the skirts<WH7757> of the robe<WH4598> pomegranates<WH7416> of blue,<WH8504> purple,<WH713> scarlet,<WH8144> and twined linen.<WH7806>

They made<WH6213> bells<WH6472> of pure<WH2889> gold,<WH2091> and put<WH5414> the bells<WH6472> between<WH8432> the pomegranates<WH7416> around<WH5439> the skirts<WH7757> of the robe,<WH4598> between<WH8432> the pomegranates;<WH7416>

a bell<WH6472> and a pomegranate,<WH7416> a bell<WH6472> and a pomegranate,<WH7416> around<WH5439> the skirts<WH7757> of the robe,<WH4598> to minister<WH8334> in,<WH3068> as Yahweh commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
They made<WH6213> the coats<WH3801> of fine linen<WH8336> of woven<WH707> work<WH4639> for Aaron,<WH175> and for his sons,<WH1121>
and the turban<WH4701> of fine linen,<WH8336> and the linen<WH8336> headbands<WH4021> of fine linen,<WH8336> and the linen<WH8336> breeches<WH4370> of fine twined<WH7806> linen,<WH8336>

and the sash<WH73> of fine twined<WH7806> linen,<WH8336> and blue,<WH8504> and purple,<WH713> and scarlet,<WH8144> the work of the embroiderer,<WH7551> as Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>

They made<WH6213> the plate<WH6731> of the holy<WH6944> crown<WH5145> of pure<WH2889> gold,<WH2091> and wrote<WH3789> on it a writing,<WH4385> like the engravings<WH6603> of a signet:<WH2368> "HOLY<WH6944> TO YAHWEH.<WH3068>"
They tied<WH5414> to it a lace<WH6616> of blue,<WH8504> to fasten<WH5414> it on the turban<WH4701> above,<WH4605> as Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>

Thus all the work<WH5656> of the tabernacle<WH4908> of the Tent<WH4908> of Meeting<WH4150> was finished.<WH3615> The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did<WH6213> according to all that Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses;<WH4872> so they did.<WH6213>

They brought<WH935> the tabernacle<WH4908> to Moses,<WH4872> the tent,<WH4908> with all its furniture,<WH3627> its clasps,<WH7165> its boards,<WH7175> its bars,<WH1280> its pillars,<WH5982> its sockets,<WH134>
the covering<WH4372> of rams<WH352>' skins<WH5785> dyed red,<WH119> the covering<WH4372> of sea cow<WH8476> hides,<WH5785> the veil<WH6532> of the screen,<WH4539>
the ark<WH727> of the testimony<WH5715> with its poles,<WH905> the mercy seat,<WH3727>
the table,<WH7979> all its vessels,<WH3627> the show bread,<WH6440>
the pure<WH2889> lampstand,<WH4501> its lamps,<WH5216> even the lamps<WH5216> to be set in order,<WH4634> all its vessels,<WH3627> the oil<WH8081> for the light,<WH3974>
the golden<WH2091> altar,<WH4196> the anointing<WH4888> oil,<WH8081> the sweet<WH5561> incense,<WH7004> the screen<WH4539> for the door<WH6607> of the Tent,<WH168>
the bronze<WH5178> altar,<WH4196> its grating<WH4345> of brass,<WH5178> its poles,<WH905> all of its vessels,<WH3627> the basin<WH3595> and its base,<WH3653>

the hangings<WH7050> of the court,<WH2691> its pillars,<WH5982> its sockets,<WH134> the screen<WH4539> for the gate<WH8179> of the court,<WH2691> its cords,<WH4340> its pins,<WH3489> all the instruments<WH3627> of the service<WH5656> of the tabernacle,<WH4908> for the Tent<WH4908> of Meeting,<WH4150>

the finely worked<WH8278> garments<WH899> for ministering<WH8334> in the holy<WH6944> place,<WH6944> the holy garments<WH899> for Aaron<WH175> the priest,<WH3548> and the garments<WH899> of his sons,<WH1121> to minister in the priest<WH3547>'s office.
According to all that Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses,<WH4872> so the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did<WH6213> all the work.<WH5656>

Moses<WH4872> saw<WH7200> all<WH3651> the work,<WH4399> and behold,<WH6213> they had done it as Yahweh<WH3068> had commanded,<WH6680> even so had they done<WH6213> it:<WH4872> and Moses blessed them.<WH1288>
